name: Kitty Click
description: A React application that deals with state to determine if something has already been clicked and to update score. Utilizes: React.

name: Eat the Burger!
description: A small application that holds burgers the users want to eat. They can then be marked as 'Devoured'. Utilizies: Node, MySQL, Sequelize, Express, and Handlebars.

name: Friend Finder
description: A questionaire that matches you to the person whom answer most closely match yours. Utilizes: Node, Express.

name: Liri-Bot
description: A CLI that returns infomation about a band, song, or movie. Utilizes: Node.

name: Bummer Passwords
description: A password manager put together as a group project. Utilizes: Firebase.

name: Train Tracker
description: A train schedule application. Utilizes: Firebase, Moment.js.

name: Gif Generator
description: Application that allows you add a topic to search for gif. It will pull up 10 still gifs that can be animated. Utilizes: Giphy API.

name: Disney Trivia
description: A trivia game that will compare you answer to the correct answers and return a score. Utilizes: Javascript objects.

name: Crystal Collector
description: A math game that requires you to hit the target total with out going over. Utilizes: jQuery.

name: Word Guess
description: A hangman style game. Utilizes: jQuery.
